pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retrieve Information from 'Google Knowledge Graph' API // Allows you to retrieve information from the 'Google Knowledge Graph' API https://www.google.com/intl/bn/insidesearch/features/search /knowledge.html and process it in R in various forms. The 'Knowledge Graph Search' API lets you find entities in the 'Google Knowledge Graph'. The API uses standard 'schema.org' types and is compliant with the 'JSON-LD' specification.
